title: Tracking economic and child income deprivation at neighbourhood level in England: 1999 to 2009
publisher: Ministry for Housing, Communities and Local Government
description: Indices tracking levels of economic deprivation from 1999 to 2009 in small areas in England called lower-layer super output areas.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to "Publications" which contains link to current and previous publications. Enter link "Tracking economic and child income deprivation at neighbourhood level in England: 1999 to 2009". Several files on this page contain the dataset/s.
sizingNotes: Simple tables and structures but spread over several files (though similar framework).
